thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Cecilia Barnhill

author: Cecilia Barnhill
title: Cecilia Barnhill
text: When I found BBG at this price (80% discount!!) I jumped on it immediately. I've seen so many wonderful transformations on Instagram and can't wait to get started. I immediately downloaded the eBook and planning on starting tonight! I also loved the seven day free trial on the Sweat with Kayla app.
